title: Tool: HTML5 Image Editor
description: This tool helps you changing the hue and saturation of images, as well as it can be used as a color picker. You can also remove all the pixels in the image based on a color.

title: Experiment: Stereoscopic 3D using JS, HTML and CSS
description: A video where I demonstrate an experiment of mine, applying Stereoscopic 3D to a webpage using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

title: Experiment: ChromaKey in JavaScript
description:
Chroma key effect using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
I used canvas, html5 video and the user's camera(user media).

title: Experiment: CSS3 3D environment tool
description: This is the Root3D, a CSS3, 3D environment, for you to build some cool 3D groups

title: Game: Test your markup
description:
An HTML, CSS and JavaScript based game.
Test your knowledge about HTML tags in a fun way.
It's also great to practice and learn, as well.
